newsitem.title: GERMANY: FRANKFURT, Aug 15 (Reuter) - Germany's motor vehicle output rose 20.
newsitem.headline: FRANKFURT, Aug 15 (Reuter) - Germany's motor vehicle output rose 20.

text.p: percent in July on a year-on-year basis, rising to 434,000 units, the VDA German vehicle association said on Friday.
The VDA also said vehicle output in the first seven months of 1997 was up five percent at 3.03 million units.
